column1: "description": "The table refers to Statewise Distribution of Surface Flow Schemes(Other Storage) in use and their Potential Created and Utilized according to Public and Private. The report has been sourced from 3rd census of minor irrigation scheme(2000-01) from Ministry of Water Resources."
"title": "Download CSV for Statewise Distribution of Surface Flow Schemes(Other Storage) in use and their Potential Created and Utilized according to Public and Private"
